# uptimekuma_notification_dingding (Resource)

DingDing notification resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Notification name
- `webhook_url` (String, Sensitive) DingDing webhook URL

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `mentioning` (String) DingDing mentioning configuration
- `secret_key` (String, Sensitive) DingDing secret key for webhook signature

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
